description:
# cfg-cam

command-line application that saves and loads DirectShow webcam settings to/from the file

## Usage

Make sure that cameras are running (this application doesn't build new graph for the device). All settings stored in cam_sett.cfg file at the same folder as .exe file.

Run without options to load saved settings.

Run with option "--savedev" to save current settings of all enabled DirectShow video input devices.

Run with option "--help" to get brief help info.
summary: command-line application that saves and loads DirectShow webcam settings to/from the file
author: https://github.com/SuslikV
